grails-app.services.grails.plugins.nimble.core
Class OpenIDService

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.services.grails.plugins.nimble.core.OpenIDService

class OpenIDService

Provides methods for interacting with OpenID authentication processes.

author:
Bradley Beddoes

Method Detail

establishDiscoveryRequest

public def establishDiscoveryRequest(def service, def responseUrl)
Establishes an OpenID request for an OpenID service who has a pre-published identity endpoint. These are generally OpenID providers say Google whom don't require users to enter their ID before continuing.
param:
service A service NAME which has been configured by openid.discovery.NAME in Nimble Apps config environment
param:
responseUrl The Url which the openID service should respond to
return:
A twin(tuple) containing org.openid4java.discovery.DiscoveryInformation and org.openid4java.message.AuthRequest for this OpenID auth attempt Will return nulls on error.

establishRequest

public def establishRequest(def discoveryID, def responseUrl)
Establishes an OpenID request for any OpenID service, user or Nimble has provided discovery endpoint.
param:
discoveryID The openID endpoint supplied by the user to discover a service at.
param:
responseUrl The Url which the openID service should respond to.
return:
A twin(tuple) containing org.openid4java.discovery.DiscoveryInformation and org.openid4java.message.AuthRequest for this OpenID auth attempt Will return nulls on error.

nimbleInit

public void nimbleInit()
Integrates with extended Nimble bootstrap process, sets up OpenID Environment once all domain objects etc have dynamic methods available to them.

processResponse

public def processResponse(def discovered, def response, def receivingUrl)
Processes an OpenID response to authenticate a user and extract personal information
param:
discovered The discovery object returned by the establish methods
param:
response A populated org.openid4java.message.ParameterList associated with the response
param:
receivingUrl The exact Url request ncluding parameters the OpenID IDP directed the user to locally
return:
A populated grails.plugins.nimble.auth.OpenIDToken or null on error
